mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into version (oldversion, newversion, packagesize, content, downloadurl, enforce, createtime, updatetime, weigh, `status`) values (#{oldversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packagesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enforce,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update version set oldversion = #{oldversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newversion = #{newversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, packagesize = #{packagesize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, downloadurl = #{downloadurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enforce = #{enforce,jdbcType=BIT}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weigh = #{weigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, oldversion, newversion, packagesize, content, downloadurl, enforce, createtime, updatetime, weigh, `status` from version where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, oldversion, newversion, packagesize, content, downloadurl, enforce, createtime, updatetime, weigh, `status` from version
